requirement_tested: A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A price-conscious shopper looking for the best deals across states.
user_goal: To search for a laptop and view up-to-date pricing information from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Search Page
narrative_steps.description: Maria visits the homepage and waits for the page to load product categories dynamically from the backend.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads with placeholder content initially, then populates category dropdown options fetched from the backend API.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Product Search
narrative_steps.description: Maria selects 'Electronics' as the category and clicks the 'Search' button to fetch matching products.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Electronics' from the category dropdown and click the 'Search' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend sends request to backend API; results appear showing various electronics including laptops with prices and suppliers.

requirement_tested: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
user_goal: Ensure the backend can connect to the PostgreSQL database and retrieve product data.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Backend Request
narrative_steps.description: While browsing the frontend, John triggers a search which prompts the backend to query the database.
narrative_steps.action: Perform a product search on the frontend.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend successfully establishes connection using specified environment variables and retrieves relevant product records from PostgreSQL.

requirement_tested: Product search functionality allowing users to select specific product categories and parameters
user_persona: A college student searching for affordable textbooks.
user_goal: Find textbooks in the 'Books' category filtered by subject and edition.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Category
narrative_steps.description: Emma opens the site and chooses 'Books' from the category dropdown to narrow her search focus.
narrative_steps.action: Click the category dropdown and select 'Books'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dropdown closes and 'Books' is displayed as the selected category.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Parameters
narrative_steps.description: Emma fills in the book title and selects the desired edition from parameter fields.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Calculus' into the title field and choose '7th Edition' from the edition dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Parameter fields update with Emma's input and edition selection.

narrative_steps.title: Executing Search
narrative_steps.description: Emma clicks the crimson 'Search' button to find matching textbooks.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Search' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page updates to show Calculus textbooks matching the selected edition.

requirement_tested: Automatic comparison of product prices across different states
user_persona: A frequent traveler buying gifts in different states.
user_goal: Compare prices of a wireless speaker across multiple states.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Product
narrative_steps.description: David searches for 'wireless speaker' and finds several models in the results.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'wireless speaker' in the search bar and submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results list appears with wireless speakers and basic price/state info.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Price Comparison
narrative_steps.description: David clicks on a speaker model to see how its price varies by state.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a wireless speaker item in the results list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Expanded view shows a comparison chart/table with prices listed per state.

requirement_tested: Display of lowest-priced products in search results
user_goal: Quickly identify the cheapest tablet available nationwide.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Lisa searches for 'tablet' hoping to find the most affordable option quickly.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'tablet' into the search bar and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search results load with tablets sorted by price, lowest first.

narrative_steps.title: Identifying Lowest Price
narrative_steps.description: Lisa notices a crimson-highlighted badge indicating the lowest price on the first result.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the first search result.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: First item displays a 'Lowest Price' badge and shows the cheapest price among all matches.

requirement_tested: Detailed product information pages showing price, quantity, and supplier information
user_persona: Tech buyer needing complete specs and sourcing details.
user_goal: Verify stock levels and supplier contact info for a graphics card.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Product Details
narrative_steps.description: Raj clicks on a graphics card listing to get more detailed information.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a graphics card entry in the search results.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigates to a dedicated product detail page with full specs, pricing, and supplier info.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Quantity and Supplier Info
narrative_steps.description: On the product page, Raj checks if there's enough stock and where it's coming from.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down to the quantity and supplier sections.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays current quantity available and supplier name along with contact/business information.

requirement_tested: User interface with seashell background color applied to the canvas
user_goal: Confirm that the entire website has a uniform seashell background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Canvas
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the homepage to evaluate overall background styling.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Entire page background renders with consistent seashell (#FFF5EE) color.

requirement_tested: All visible UI components styled with crimson color
user_goal: Verify that all interactive elements use the correct crimson color theme.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Interactive Elements
narrative_steps.description: Jamie inspects buttons, links, and form fields to ensure they match the crimson theme.
narrative_steps.action: Visit any page and observe primary UI components.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons, links, form borders, and headings are consistently styled with crimson (#DC143C).

requirement_tested: Category selection filters for refining product searches
user_persona: Busy parent shopping for home essentials.
user_goal: Filter product results to only show items in the 'Home & Garden' category.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Category Filters
narrative_steps.description: Patricia looks to refine her search and clicks the category filter dropdown.
narrative_steps.action: Click the category dropdown menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of categories appears with checkboxes or selectable options.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Category Filter
narrative_steps.description: She selects 'Home & Garden' and applies the filter to update results.
narrative_steps.action: Check 'Home & Garden' and click 'Apply Filters'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results reload showing only products in the 'Home & Garden' category.

requirement_tested: State selection functionality for geographic filtering
user_goal: Find office chairs sold specifically in Texas and California.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing State Selection
narrative_steps.description: Michael wants to limit his chair search to specific states and opens the state filter.
narrative_steps.action: Click the state selection dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Full list of U.S. states appears for selection.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Target States
narrative_steps.description: He selects Texas and California from the list and confirms his choices.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Texas' and 'California', then click 'Apply Geographic Filter'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search results update to show only office chairs available in those two states.

user_persona: Online deal hunter tracking price drops.
user_goal: Monitor fluctuating prices of a gaming console during a sale event.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Prices
narrative_steps.description: Sarah keeps the product page open to watch for sudden price reductions.
narrative_steps.action: Leave the product page open after initial load.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Prices auto-refresh periodically, updating displayed values automatically.

narrative_steps.title: Manually Refreshing Data
narrative_steps.description: Noticing no change, Sarah manually refreshes to get latest data instantly.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Refresh Now' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Latest pricing data is fetched and displayed immediately on the screen.

requirement_tested: Supplier details display including contact or business information
user_goal: Access detailed supplier information for a potential bulk order.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Supplier Info
narrative_steps.description: Robert views a printer cartridge listing and wants to know more about the seller.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the supplier name linked under the product listing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a supplier profile page displaying business and contact details.

requirement_tested: Search result sorting options including by price, state, and relevance
user_goal: Sort search results by price to make informed purchasing decisions.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Sort Options
narrative_steps.description: Nancy finishes a keyword search and now wants to organize the results.
narrative_steps.action: Click the sorting dropdown menu near the top of the results list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dropdown menu reveals sorting options such as Price, State, and Relevance.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Price Sorting
narrative_steps.description: She decides to sort items from lowest to highest price.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Price: Low to High' from the dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results reorder instantly, showing cheapest items first.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible with desktop and mobile views
user_goal: Browse and purchase items seamlessly on a smartphone.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Derek opens the site on his mobile phone to look for a Bluetooth speaker.
narrative_steps.action: Open website URL on a mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site layout adjusts responsively with collapsible menus and appropriately sized touch targets.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Touch Controls
narrative_steps.description: Derek taps through filters and product listings without difficulty.
narrative_steps.action: Tap on filter controls and product cards.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive elements respond accurately to touch gestures.

requirement_tested: Configuration of package.json to support `npm run install:all` for FE & BE dependencies and `npm run dev` for concurrent development startup
user_persona: Development team lead setting up project workflow.
user_goal: Set up and run both frontend and backend services efficiently during development.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clones the repo and prepares to set up the development environment.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed successfully.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: With everything installed, Taylor starts both development servers together.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` command.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers launch concurrently without conflicts.
